title: ASTI Launches novo - Automatic Volume Control for Smartphones
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Adaptive Sound Technologies, Inc. (ASTI) 
SAN JOSE, Calif., Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Adaptive Sound Technologies, Inc. (ASTI) today launched novo(TM), the world's first wearable personal audio device that adjusts your volume up or down based on ambient noise. 
To learn more, visit the novo IndieGoGo campaign ( http://bit.ly/1Kk8qJm ). 
novo uses patented Adaptive Audio Technology(TM) to automatically monitor and adjust headphone volume based on your surroundings and adapts your audio in real time by either boosting or reducing the volume to provide you with a seamless listening experience. -- "Boost Mode" automatically increases headphone volume to drown out the sounds around you, and then decrease volume when the noise around you subsides. For instance, when listening to audio on your headphones in environments such as crowded streets or on public transportation. -- "Reduce Mode" reduces audio volume automatically if an outside noise needs attention, such as a coworker approaching to speak with you or riding your bike in traffic. 
"We created novo to give you the ultimate listening experience," said Sam Nicolino, President and Chief Executive Officer of ASTI. "Using the same patented technology found in our best-selling Sound+Sleep Therapy Systems, we redefined the science of smart volume control. Aside from the convenience provided to users, we wanted to create a product that valued safety when utilizing headphones - combating ear-fatigue and providing volume only as loud as it needs to be for healthy listening." 
novo contains a state of the art MEMs microphone integrated with a hardware platform and synced with software algorithms to intelligently listen to your environment and adapt audio based on noise levels. It's all done automatically to keep your phone calls heard, audio listening consistent and all things media sounding great at the right audio levels. 
novo connects to any iPhone, Android, mobile phone, MP3 or tablet with a standard 3.5mm audio jack and uses standard batteries, providing over 200 hours of operation or approximately six week of use. novo also features an adjustable slider that allows you to personalize the microphone sensitivity to best suit your preferences along with a metal clip that attaches to your pocket, waist or shirt. novo is available in gold metallic, brushed aluminum silver and blue metallic. 
Pricing and Availability 
Visit the novo IndieGoGo campaign page to participate or www.asticorp.com for more information. 
About Adaptive Sound Technologies, Inc. (ASTI) 
ASTI was founded in 2008 and is now a leading supplier of sound machines and adaptive audio products. The company's mission, "Adapting audio and improving lives," has been the driving force behind its innovation and product development. Headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley, ASTI has developed best-selling sound machines like Sound+Sleep and LectroFan that redefine the science of sleep and recently expanded its reach to the wearable tech and smart volume control markets with its novo technology.
